title: Cant accept queue or get past banning phase so i just keep getting kicked
body: the issue started last night were the queue was not popping at all so i looked up fixes and tried them and next queue i actually accepted but then whoever was banning didn't ban on my screen and they would just sit at zero until i get kicked for not locking in my ban or champion. i uninstalled league completely last night and reinstalled this morning and played two games without any issues but the problems resumed so i ran hextech repair tool and i said everything is ok so i am at a loss for things to try here

replies.body: When you are in queue and accept a match, every player needs to connect to the server to get grouped in together.  It sounds like you're having a network issue that's leaving you behind and losing sync.  The hextech repair tool is a great feature, but it's not going to fix every connection problem.  I recommend also using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and stay in your group!  Let me know if you have any questions.
